title: David’s Final Words and Mighty Men
summary: David’s final poetic words honor God’s covenant with him. The chapter also lists David’s mighty warriors and their heroic deeds, showcasing the strength and loyalty that supported his reign.

faq.question: What do David’s last words focus on?
faq.answer: God’s covenant and the blessing of righteous leadership.

faq.question: Who are the ‘mighty men’?
faq.answer: David’s elite warriors who performed great feats of bravery in battle.
